page.title: 10COBHAM SURREY - SHOPPING
page.content:
The total number of people interviewed was 40. 30 of these lived in Cobham; the other 10 were outsiders. 1 person had come as far as 9 miles to shop. Most tended to shop here 1-3 times per week. We found that 20 people visited Waitrose most frequently, 11 visited Tesco's most. Other popular shops were Bejams, Farrants (Newsagent), Cullens, the butcher and the greengrocer.
Out of the Cobham residents, 22 people spent their leisure time at home and 8 did not. Of the 8, 4 stayed in Cobham and 4 went out.
